name: memories
description: Memories is a self-hosted photo and video backup tool with web UI for media browsing. It supports deduplication, metadata, face and object recognition while syncing from multiple devices.

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Automatically sync photos and videos from mobile devices to your server

features.title: Face Recognition
features.description: Identify and group photos by detected faces for easy person-based browsing

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Automatically tag photos with detected objects, scenes, and activities

features.title: Timeline View
features.description: Browse your photo collection chronologically with smooth infinite scrolling

features.title: Album Organization
features.description: Create and manage albums to group related photos and videos

features.title: Metadata Extraction
features.description: Read and display EXIF data including location, camera settings, and timestamps

features.title: Deduplication
features.description: Automatically detect and handle duplicate photos to save storage space

features.title: Map View
features.description: View photos on a map based on GPS coordinates from image metadata
